title: How many cameras will the iPhone have in 2029? - Quora

response.answer_text: That is a long time from now, I doubt Apple even knows at this point. If you fat fingered and meant 2019 the iPhone 11 has 2 cameras and the iPhone 11 Pros have 3 cameras. There is no point in speculating that far in advanced as phones as we know it now could be different in another 10 years, we are already shifted designs on the screen taking up the whole front of the device, we are currently trying to make phones with a foldable screen, what could be next after that? No clue, but what ever it might be by 2029 we should find out!
